name: DOOM 2 - The lost Temple
description:
Found all secrets of the lost temple.

Main controls :

- mouse : view.

- click : shoot, attack.

- up and down arrow : move.

- shift : run.

- numbers : change guns.

- space : interact.

For play, launch the application "Doom 2 - The lost Temple" (zdoom).

When you are in the 6th level, you win, save to remember your victory.

 

Warning : there is a little blood (pixel) in the game.

 

This is a fan game of the granddaddy first person shooter computer game "Doom 2" and is not associated with the creators "id software". This game does NOT gain any financial profit and is distributed as freeware.

v1.2
